title: Damian Green – 2003 Speech to Conservative Party Conference
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Damian Green, the then Shadow Secretary of State for Education, at the Conservative Party conference held in Blackpool on 6 October 2003.
content:
In 1996 Tony Blair stood on this spot and famously said that his priority was education, education, education.
